dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: THANK YOU CLEARBANK! WE HAVE BEEN A.C.E--

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: <size=50>--Amoral Corpse Eaters--</size>

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: --AND WEeeeee have been spotted by security oh no--

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: <size=30>We gotta run right now.</size>

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: <size=30>Wait, before we go, next venue! Tell them!</size>

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Oh good idea UHHH WE'LL BE AT THE HIDDEN CITY NEXT, WHETHER ABSOLUTE RECORDS LIKES IT OR NOT!

dialogue.name: Crowd
dialogue.text: <size=100>WOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!</size>

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Alright, everyone to the van!

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: You think I could fit through the vents...?

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Baap re baap...
<color=#000000>Back at the van...</color>

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: That was SICK!

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: 'twas.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAA--

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Sonu will agree with us when she's able to form words.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Ohhh Gods I don't want to go to jail are we wanted are we on the news aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa--
<color=#000000>Sonu frantically scrolls their phone.</color>

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Wait... Wait, wait, wait, wait--

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: You good?

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: I don't know!

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Sonu, I know something's happening right now but you do still need to breathe.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: We just got about a hundred new followers on MythSpace!

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Which, er, isn't a lot in the grand scheme of things, but it's a lot more than we had before!

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: ...WAIT WAIT WAIT WAIT--

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: Another one taken......

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: This might actually-- we might actually--

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Wait, the Concert of Cleansing is held in public spaces so we can't technically go to jail for trespassing--

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: If we keep this up, we're going to be FAMOUS.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Well, I'd temper your expectations but... Yes. We're going to have an audience. We're going to be real musicians!

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: <size=30>And not just a band who's never released a proper album and mostly plays in Fayruz's basement...</size>
<color=#a7b5b7><size=40>...Remember your reasons.........you carry our songs......</size></color>

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: ...Did anyone else hear that?

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Huh? Sorry, I'm a little distracted with my dreams of rock-based world domination.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Niimi, are you spacing out again?

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: ...I'm going insane.

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: ...But the voice is right. We need to remember why we're doing this.
